Query.Sql: with results as ( select distinct apc.NHSNumber, apc.HospitalProviderSpellNumber, cc.CriticalCareStartDate as VisitStartDate, coalesce(cc.CriticalCareStartTime, '00:00:00') as VisitStartTime, coalesce(cc.CriticalCarePeriodDischargeDate, cc.EventDate) as VisitEndDate, coalesce(cc.CriticalCarePeriodDischargeTime, '00:00:00') as VisitEndTime from omop_staging.sus_CCMDS cc inner join omop_staging.sus_APC apc on cc.GeneratedRecordID = apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier where apc.NHSNumber is not null ) select * from results order by NHSNumber, HospitalProviderSpellNumber, VisitStartDate, VisitStartTime, VisitEndDate, VisitEndTime

Explanation.Description: CDS specific hospital spell number that binds many episodes together.
Start time of the visit, if exists, else midnight.
Discharge date of the critical care period, if exists, else the event date
